title.text: RFC 3790:  Survey of IPv4 Addresses in Currently Deployed IETF Internet Area Standards Track and Experimental Documents

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                    C. Mickles, Ed.
Request for Comments: 3790
Category: Informational                                    P. Nesser, II
                                              Nesser & Nesser Consulting
                                                               June 2004
Survey of IPv4 Addresses in Currently Deployed IETF Internet Area Standards Track and Experimental Documents
contents.zh-CHS: 当前部署的IETF Internet区域标准跟踪和实验文档中IPv4地址的调查

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This memo provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录为互联网社区提供信息。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Copyright Notice
contents.zh-CHS: 版权公告

contents.zh-CHS: 版权所有（C）互联网协会（2004年）。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document seeks to document all usage of IPv4 addresses in currently deployed IETF Internet Area documented standards. In order to successfully transition from an all IPv4 Internet to an all IPv6 Internet, many interim steps will be taken. One of these steps is the evolution of current protocols that have IPv4 dependencies. It is hoped that these protocols (and their implementations) will be redesigned to be network address independent, but failing that will at least dually support IPv4 and IPv6. To this end, all Standards (Full, Draft, and Proposed) as well as Experimental RFCs will be surveyed and any dependencies will be documented.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档旨在记录当前部署的IETF互联网区域文件化标准中IPv4地址的所有使用情况。为了成功地从全IPv4 Internet过渡到全IPv6 Internet，将采取许多临时步骤。其中一个步骤是发展具有IPv4依赖关系的当前协议。人们希望这些协议（及其实现）将被重新设计为与网络地址无关，但如果不能做到这一点，则至少会同时支持IPv4和IPv6。为此，将调查所有标准（完整、草案和提议）以及实验性RFC，并记录任何相关性。

1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: This document is part of a document set aiming to document all usage of IPv4 addresses in IETF standards. In an effort to have the information in a manageable form, it has been broken into 7 documents conforming to the current IETF areas (Application, Internet, Management & Operations, Routing, Security, Sub-IP and Transport).
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档是旨在记录IETF标准中IPv4地址的所有使用情况的文档集的一部分。为了使信息具有可管理的形式，已将其分为符合当前IETF领域（应用、互联网、管理和运营、路由、安全、子IP和传输）的7个文档。

contents.text: This specific document focuses on usage of IPv4 addresses within the Internet area.
contents.zh-CHS: 本特定文档重点介绍Internet区域内IPv4地址的使用。

contents.text: For a full introduction, please see the introduction [1] document.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关完整的介绍，请参见介绍[1]文档。

contents.text: 2. Document Organization
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 文件组织

contents.text: The following sections 3, 4, 5, and 6 each describe the raw analysis of Full, Draft, and Proposed Standards, and Experimental RFCs. Each RFC is discussed in turn starting with RFC 1 and ending in (about) RFC 3100. The comments for each RFC are "raw" in nature. That is, each RFC is discussed in a vacuum and problems or issues discussed do not "look ahead" to see if any of the issues raised have already been fixed.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下第3、4、5和6节分别描述了完整、草案和拟议标准以及实验RFC的原始分析。依次讨论每个RFC，从RFC 1开始，到RFC 3100结束。每个RFC的注释本质上是“原始”的。也就是说，每个RFC都是在真空中讨论的，所讨论的问题不会“向前看”，以查看所提出的任何问题是否已经得到解决。

contents.text: Section 7 is an analysis of the data presented in Sections 3, 4, 5, and 6. It is here that all of the results are considered as a whole and the problems that have been resolved in later RFCs are correlated.
contents.zh-CHS: 第7节是对第3、4、5和6节中提供的数据的分析。正是在这里，所有的结果都被视为一个整体，并且在以后的RFC中解决的问题被关联起来。

contents.text: 3. Full Standards
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 完全标准

contents.text: Full Internet Standards (most commonly simply referred to as "Standards") are fully mature protocol specification that are widely implemented and used throughout the Internet.
contents.zh-CHS: 完整的互联网标准（通常简称为“标准”）是在整个互联网上广泛实施和使用的完全成熟的协议规范。

contents.text: 3.1. RFC 791 Internet Protocol
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1. RFC791因特网协议

contents.text: This specification defines IPv4; IPv6 has been specified in separate documents.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了IPv4；IPv6已在单独的文档中指定。

contents.text: 3.2. RFC 792 Internet Control Message Protocol
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. RFC792因特网控制消息协议

contents.text: This specification defines ICMP, and is inherently IPv4 dependent.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范定义了ICMP，并且本质上依赖于IPv4。

contents.text: 3.3. RFC 826 Ethernet Address Resolution Protocol
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. RFC 826以太网地址解析协议

contents.text: There are no IPv4 dependencies in this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范中不存在IPv4依赖项。

contents.text: 3.4. RFC 891 DCN Local-Network Protocols
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4. RFC 891 DCN本地网络协议

contents.text: There are many implicit assumptions about the use of IPv4 addresses in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档中有许多关于IPv4地址使用的隐含假设。

contents.text: 3.5. RFC 894 Standard for the transmission of IP datagrams over Ethernet networks
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5. 通过以太网传输IP数据报的RFC 894标准

contents.text: This specification specifically deals with the transmission of IPv4 packets over Ethernet.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范专门涉及通过以太网传输IPv4数据包。

contents.text: 3.6. RFC 895 Standard for the transmission of IP datagrams over experimental Ethernet networks
contents.zh-CHS: 3.6. RFC 895在实验以太网上传输IP数据报的标准

contents.text: This specification specifically deals with the transmission of IPv4 packets over experimental Ethernet.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范专门涉及通过实验以太网传输IPv4数据包。

contents.text: 3.7. RFC 903 Reverse Address Resolution Protocol
contents.zh-CHS: 3.7. RFC 903反向地址解析协议

contents.text: There are no IPv4 dependencies in this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范中不存在IPv4依赖项。

contents.text: 3.8. RFC 919 Broadcasting Internet Datagrams
contents.zh-CHS: 3.8. RFC 919广播互联网数据报

contents.text: This specification defines broadcasting for IPv4; IPv6 uses multicast so this is not applicable.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了IPv4的广播；IPv6使用多播，因此这不适用。

contents.text: 3.9. RFC 922 Broadcasting Internet datagrams in the presence of subnets
contents.zh-CHS: 3.9. RFC 922在存在子网的情况下广播互联网数据报

contents.text: This specification defines how broadcasts should be treated in the presence of subnets. IPv6 uses multicast so this is not applicable.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了在存在子网的情况下如何处理广播。IPv6使用多播，因此这不适用。

contents.text: 3.10. RFC 950 Internet Standard Subnetting Procedure
contents.zh-CHS: 3.10. RFC 950互联网标准子网程序

contents.text: This specification defines IPv4 subnetting; similar functionality is part of IPv6 addressing architecture to begin with.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了IPv4子网；类似的功能是IPv6寻址体系结构的一部分。

contents.text: 3.11. RFC 1034 Domain Names: Concepts and Facilities
contents.zh-CHS: 3.11. RFC1034域名：概念和设施

contents.text: In Section 3.6, "Resource Records", the definition of A record is:
contents.zh-CHS: 在第3.6节“资源记录”中，记录的定义为：

contents.text: RDATA which is the type and sometimes class dependent data which describes the resource:
contents.zh-CHS: RDATA是描述资源的类型数据，有时是类相关数据：

contents.text: A For the IN class, a 32 bit IP address
contents.zh-CHS: 对于类中的，一个32位IP地址

contents.text: And Section 5.2.1, "Typical functions" defines:
contents.zh-CHS: 第5.2.1节“典型功能”定义：

contents.text: 1. Host name to host address translation.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 主机名到主机地址的转换。

contents.text: This function is often defined to mimic a previous HOSTS.TXT based function. Given a character string, the caller wants one or more 32 bit IP addresses. Under the DNS, it translates into a request for type A RRs. Since the DNS does not preserve the order of RRs, this function may choose to sort the returned addresses or select the "best" address if the service returns only one choice to the client. Note that a multiple address return is recommended, but a single address may be the only way to emulate prior HOSTS.TXT services.
contents.zh-CHS: 此函数通常被定义为模仿以前基于HOSTS.TXT的函数。给定一个字符串，调用方需要一个或多个32位IP地址。在DNS下，它转换为a型RRs请求。由于DNS不保留RRs的顺序，因此如果服务仅向客户端返回一个选项，此函数可以选择对返回的地址进行排序或选择“最佳”地址。请注意，建议使用多地址返回，但单个地址可能是模拟以前的HOSTS.TXT服务的唯一方法。

contents.text: 2. Host address to host name translation
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 主机地址到主机名的转换

contents.text: This function will often follow the form of previous functions. Given a 32 bit IP address, the caller wants a character string. The octets of the IP address are reversed, used as name components, and suffixed with "IN-ADDR.ARPA". A type PTR query is used to get the RR with the primary name of the host. For example, a request for the host name corresponding to IP address 1.2.3.4 looks for PTR RRs for domain name "4.3.2.1.IN-ADDR.ARPA".
contents.zh-CHS: 此函数通常遵循以前函数的形式。给定32位IP地址，调用方需要一个字符串。IP地址的八位字节是反向的，用作名称组件，并以“IN-ADDR.ARPA”作为后缀。类型PTR查询用于获取带有主机主名称的RR。例如，请求IP地址1.2.3.4对应的主机名时，会查找域名“4.3.2.1.IN-ADDR.ARPA”的PTR RRs。

contents.text: There are, of course, numerous examples of IPv4 addresses scattered throughout the document.
contents.zh-CHS: 当然，本文档中有许多IPv4地址的示例。

contents.text: 3.12. RFC 1035 Domain Names: Implementation and Specification
contents.zh-CHS: 3.12. RFC1035域名：实现和规范

contents.text: Section 3.4.1, "A RDATA format", defines the format for A records:
contents.zh-CHS: 第3.4.1节“RDATA格式”定义了记录的格式：

contents.text: where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: ADDRESS A 32 bit Internet address.
contents.zh-CHS: 地址一个32位的因特网地址。

contents.text: Hosts that have multiple Internet addresses will have multiple A records.
contents.zh-CHS: 具有多个Internet地址的主机将具有多个A记录。

contents.text: A records cause no additional section processing. The RDATA section of an A line in a master file is an Internet address expressed as four decimal numbers separated by dots without any embedded spaces (e.g.,"10.2.0.52" or "192.0.5.6").
contents.zh-CHS: A记录不会导致额外的节处理。主文件中A行的RDATA部分是一个互联网地址，表示为四个由点分隔的十进制数字，没有任何嵌入空格（例如，“10.2.0.52”或“192.0.5.6”）。

contents.text: And Section 3.4.2, "WKS RDATA", format is:
contents.zh-CHS: 第3.4.2节“WKS RDATA”的格式为：

contents.text: where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: ADDRESS An 32 bit Internet address
contents.zh-CHS: 地址一个32位的因特网地址

contents.text: PROTOCOL An 8 bit IP protocol number
contents.zh-CHS: 协议一个8位IP协议号

contents.text: <BIT MAP> A variable length bit map. The bit map must be a multiple of 8 bits long.
contents.zh-CHS: <BIT MAP>可变长度位图。位图必须是8位长度的倍数。

contents.text: The WKS record is used to describe the well known services supported by a particular protocol on a particular internet address. The PROTOCOL field specifies an IP protocol number, and the bit map has one bit per port of the specified protocol. The first bit corresponds to port 0, the second to port 1, etc. If the bit map does not include a bit for a protocol of interest, that bit is assumed zero. The appropriate values and mnemonics for ports and protocols are specified in RFC1010.
contents.zh-CHS: WKS记录用于描述特定互联网地址上特定协议支持的众所周知的服务。协议字段指定IP协议编号，位图中指定协议的每个端口有一个位。第一位对应端口0，第二位对应端口1，等等。如果位图不包括感兴趣的协议的位，则该位假定为零。RFC1010中规定了端口和协议的适当值和助记符。

contents.text: For example, if PROTOCOL=TCP (6), the 26th bit corresponds to TCP port 25 (SMTP). If this bit is set, a SMTP server should be listening on TCP port 25; if zero, SMTP service is not supported on the specified address.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，如果协议=TCP（6），则第26位对应于TCP端口25（SMTP）。如果设置了此位，SMTP服务器应在TCP端口25上侦听；如果为零，则指定地址不支持SMTP服务。

contents.text: The purpose of WKS RRs is to provide availability information for servers for TCP and UDP. If a server supports both TCP and UDP, or has multiple Internet addresses, then multiple WKS RRs are used.
contents.zh-CHS: WKS RRs的目的是为TCP和UDP服务器提供可用性信息。如果服务器同时支持TCP和UDP，或具有多个Internet地址，则使用多个WKS RRs。

contents.text: WKS RRs cause no additional section processing.
contents.zh-CHS: WKS RRs不会导致额外的区段处理。

contents.text: Section 3.5, "IN-ADDR.ARPA domain", describes reverse DNS lookups and is clearly IPv4 dependent.
contents.zh-CHS: 第3.5节“IN-ADDR.ARPA域”描述了反向DNS查找，并且明显依赖于IPv4。

contents.text: There are, of course, numerous examples of IPv4 addresses scattered throughout the document.
contents.zh-CHS: 当然，本文档中有许多IPv4地址的示例。

contents.text: 3.13. RFC 1042 Standard for the transmission of IP datagrams over IEEE 802 networks
contents.zh-CHS: 3.13. 在IEEE 802网络上传输IP数据报的RFC 1042标准

contents.text: This specification specifically deals with the transmission of IPv4 packets over IEEE 802 networks.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范专门涉及通过IEEE 802网络传输IPv4数据包。

contents.text: 3.14. RFC 1044 Internet Protocol on Network System's HYPERchannel: Protocol Specification
contents.zh-CHS: 3.14. RFC 1044网络系统超通道上的Internet协议：协议规范

contents.text: There are a variety of methods used in this standard to map IPv4 addresses to 32 bits fields in the HYPERchannel headers. This specification does not support IPv6.
contents.zh-CHS: 本标准中使用了多种方法将IPv4地址映射到超通道头中的32位字段。此规范不支持IPv6。

contents.text: 3.15. RFC 1055 Nonstandard for transmission of IP datagrams over serial lines: SLIP
contents.zh-CHS: 3.15. RFC 1055通过串行线路传输IP数据报的非标准：SLIP

contents.text: This specification is more of an analysis of the shortcomings of SLIP which is unsurprising. The introduction of PPP as a general replacement of SLIP has made this specification essentially unused. No update need be considered.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范更多地分析了滑动的缺点，这并不奇怪。PPP作为滑动的一般替代品的引入使得本规范基本上未被使用。不需要考虑更新。

contents.text: 3.16. RFC 1088 Standard for the transmission of IP datagrams over NetBIOS networks
contents.zh-CHS: 3.16. 通过NetBIOS网络传输IP数据报的RFC 1088标准

contents.text: This specification documents a technique to encapsulate IP packets inside NetBIOS packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范记录了一种将IP数据包封装在NetBIOS数据包中的技术。

contents.text: The technique presented of using NetBIOS names of the form IP.XX.XX.XX.XX will not work for IPv6 addresses since the length of IPv6 addresses will not fit within the NetBIOS 15 octet name limitation.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用IP.XX.XX.XX.XX格式的NetBIOS名称的技术不适用于IPv6地址，因为IPv6地址的长度不符合NetBIOS 15八位组名称限制。

contents.text: 3.17. RFC 1112 Host Extensions for IP Multicasting
contents.zh-CHS: 3.17. 用于IP多播的RFC 1112主机扩展

contents.text: This specification defines IP multicast. Parts of the document are IPv4 dependent.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了IP多播。文档的某些部分依赖于IPv4。

contents.text: 3.18. RFC 1132 Standard for the transmission of 802.2 packets over IPX networks
contents.zh-CHS: 3.18. 通过IPX网络传输802.2数据包的RFC 1132标准

contents.text: There are no IPv4 dependencies in this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范中不存在IPv4依赖项。

contents.text: 3.19. RFC 1201 Transmitting IP traffic over ARCNET networks
contents.zh-CHS: 3.19. RFC 1201通过ARCNET网络传输IP流量

contents.text: The major concerns of this specification with respect to IPv4 addresses occur in the resolution of ARCnet 8bit addresses to IPv4 addresses in an "ARPlike" method. This is incompatible with IPv6.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范关于IPv4地址的主要关注点在于以“类似ARP”的方法将ARCnet 8位地址解析为IPv4地址。这与IPv6不兼容。

contents.text: 3.20. RFC 1209 The Transmission of IP Datagrams over the SMDS Service
contents.zh-CHS: 3.20. RFC 1209通过SMDS服务传输IP数据报

contents.text: This specification defines running IPv4 and ARP over SMDS. The methods described could easily be extended to support IPv6 packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了在SMD上运行IPv4和ARP。所描述的方法可以很容易地扩展到支持IPv6数据包。

contents.text: 3.21. RFC 1390 Transmission of IP and ARP over FDDI Networks
contents.zh-CHS: 3.21. RFC 1390通过FDDI网络传输IP和ARP

contents.text: This specification defines the use of IPv4 address on FDDI networks. There are numerous IPv4 dependencies in the specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了在FDDI网络上使用IPv4地址。规范中有许多IPv4依赖项。

contents.text: In particular the value of the Protocol Type Code (2048 for IPv4) and a corresponding Protocol Address length (4 bytes for IPv4) needs to be created. A discussion of broadcast and multicast addressing techniques is also included, and similarly must be updated for IPv6 networks. The defined MTU limitation of 4096 octets of data (with 256 octets reserved header space) should remain sufficient for IPv6.
contents.zh-CHS: 尤其需要创建协议类型代码（IPv4为2048）的值和相应的协议地址长度（IPv4为4字节）。还包括对广播和多播寻址技术的讨论，同样，必须针对IPv6网络进行更新。定义的4096个八位字节数据的MTU限制（保留256个八位字节的报头空间）应足以支持IPv6。

contents.text: 3.22. RFC 1661 The Point-to-Point Protocol (PPP)
contents.zh-CHS: 3.22. RFC 1661点对点协议（PPP）

contents.text: There are no IPv4 dependencies in this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范中不存在IPv4依赖项。

contents.text: 3.23. RFC 1662 PPP in HDLC-like Framing
contents.zh-CHS: 3.23. 类HDLC帧中的RFC1662 PPP

contents.text: There are no IPv4 dependencies in this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范中不存在IPv4依赖项。

contents.text: 3.24. RFC 2427 Multiprotocol Interconnect over Frame Relay
contents.zh-CHS: 3.24. RFC 2427多协议互连帧中继

contents.text: There are no IPv4 dependencies in this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范中不存在IPv4依赖项。

contents.text: 4. Draft Standards
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 标准草案

contents.text: Draft Standards represent the penultimate standard level in the IETF. A protocol can only achieve draft standard when there are multiple, independent, interoperable implementations. Draft Standards are usually quite mature and widely used.
contents.zh-CHS: 标准草案代表IETF中倒数第二个标准级别。只有当存在多个独立的、可互操作的实现时，协议才能实现标准草案。标准草案通常是相当成熟和广泛使用的。

contents.text: 4.1. RFC 951 Bootstrap Protocol (BOOTP)
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1. RFC 951引导协议（BOOTP）

contents.text: This protocol is designed specifically for use with IPv4, for example:
contents.zh-CHS: 此协议专门设计用于IPv4，例如：

contents.text: Section 3. Packet Format
contents.zh-CHS: 第3节。数据包格式

contents.text: All numbers shown are decimal, unless indicated otherwise. The BOOTP packet is enclosed in a standard IP UDP datagram. For simplicity it is assumed that the BOOTP packet is never fragmented. Any numeric fields shown are packed in 'standard network byte order', i.e., high order bits are sent first.
contents.zh-CHS: 除非另有说明，否则显示的所有数字均为十进制。BOOTP数据包包含在标准IP UDP数据报中。为简单起见，假定BOOTP数据包从不分段。显示的任何数字字段均按“标准网络字节顺序”打包，即先发送高阶位。

contents.text: In the IP header of a bootrequest, the client fills in its own IP source address if known, otherwise zero. When the server address is unknown, the IP destination address will be the 'broadcast address' 255.255.255.255. This address means 'broadcast on the local cable, (I don't know my net number)'.
contents.zh-CHS: 在bootrequest的IP头中，客户机填写自己的IP源地址（如果已知），否则为零。当服务器地址未知时，IP目标地址将是“广播地址”255.255.255.255。这个地址的意思是“在本地有线电视上广播，（我不知道我的网络号码）”。

contents.text:
FIELD   BYTES   DESCRIPTION
-----   -----   ---
[...] ciaddr 4 client IP address; filled in by client in bootrequest if known.
contents.zh-CHS: […]ciaddr 4客户端IP地址；由客户端在bootrequest中填写（如果已知）。

contents.text: yiaddr 4 'your' (client) IP address; filled by server if client doesn't know its own address (ciaddr was 0).
contents.zh-CHS: yiaddr 4“您的”（客户）IP地址；如果客户端不知道自己的地址，则由服务器填写（ciaddr为0）。

contents.text: siaddr 4 server IP address; returned in bootreply by server.
contents.zh-CHS: siaddr 4服务器IP地址；服务器在引导应答中返回。

contents.text: giaddr 4 gateway IP address, used in optional cross-gateway booting.
contents.zh-CHS: giaddr 4网关IP地址，用于可选的跨网关引导。

contents.text: Since the packet format is a fixed 300 bytes in length, an updated version of the specification could easily accommodate an additional 48 bytes (4 IPv6 fields of 16 bytes to replace the existing 4 IPv4 fields of 4 bytes).
contents.zh-CHS: 由于数据包格式的长度是固定的300字节，因此该规范的更新版本可以轻松容纳额外的48字节（4个16字节的IPv6字段替换现有的4个4字节的IPv4字段）。

contents.text: This document is clearly informally superseded by RFC 1390, "Transmission of IP and ARP over FDDI Networks", even though no formal deprecation has been done. Therefore, this specification is not considered further in this memo.

contents.text: 4.3. RFC 1191 Path MTU discovery

contents.text: The entire process of PMTU discovery is predicated on the use of the DF bit in the IPv4 header, an ICMP message (also IPv4 dependent) and TCP MSS option. This is not compatible with IPv6.

contents.text: Class The Class field is one octet and indicates the identifier address space. The most up-to-date values of the LCP Endpoint Discriminator Class field are specified in the most recent "Assigned Numbers" RFC. Current values are assigned as follows:

contents.text: Section 5.1, "Packet Formats", contains the following excerpt:
contents.zh-CHS: 第5.1节“数据包格式”包含以下摘录：

contents.text: EtherType (16 bits) SHALL be set as defined in Assigned Numbers: IP = 2048 ('0800'h), ARP = 2054 ('0806'h), RARP = 32,821 ('8035'h).
contents.zh-CHS: EtherType（16位）应按照指定的编号进行设置：IP=2048（'0800'h），ARP=2054（'0806'h），RARP=32821（'8035'h）。

contents.text: Section 5.5, "MTU", has the following definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 第5.5节“MTU”的定义如下：

contents.text: The MTU for HIPPI-SC LANs is 65280 bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: HIPPI-SC LAN的MTU为65280字节。

contents.text: This value was selected because it allows the IP packet to fit in one 64K byte buffer with up to 256 bytes of overhead. The overhead is 40 bytes at the present time; there are 216 bytes of room for expansion.
contents.zh-CHS: 之所以选择此值，是因为它允许IP数据包以高达256字节的开销装入一个64K字节的缓冲区。目前开销为40字节；有216字节的扩展空间。

contents.text:
HIPPI-FP Header                  8 bytes
HIPPI-LE Header                 24 bytes
IEEE 802.2 LLC/SNAP Headers      8 bytes
Maximum IP packet size (MTU) 65280 bytes
                             ------------
                  Total      65320 bytes (64K - 216)
This definition is not applicable for IPv6 packets since packets can be larger than the IPv4 limitation of 65280 bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 此定义不适用于IPv6数据包，因为数据包可能大于IPv4的65280字节限制。

contents.text: 5. Proposed Standards
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 拟议标准

contents.text: Proposed Standards are introductory level documents. There are no requirements for even a single implementation. In many cases, Proposed are never implemented or advanced in the IETF standards process. They, therefore, are often just proposed ideas that are presented to the Internet community. Sometimes flaws are exposed or they are one of many competing solutions to problems. In these later cases, no discussion is presented as it would not serve the purpose of this discussion.
contents.zh-CHS: 拟议标准是介绍性文件。即使是单个实现也没有要求。在许多情况下，在IETF标准过程中从未实施或推进提议的标准。因此，它们通常只是向互联网社区提出的想法。有时缺陷会暴露出来，或者是许多相互竞争的问题解决方案之一。在后一种情况下，不进行讨论，因为这不符合本次讨论的目的。

contents.text: 5.1. RFC 1234 Tunneling IPX traffic through IP networks
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1. RFC 1234通过IP网络隧道IPX流量

contents.text: The section "Unicast Address Mappings" has the following text:
contents.zh-CHS: “单播地址映射”部分包含以下文本：

contents.text: For implementations of this memo, the first two octets of the host number will always be zero and the last four octets will be the node's four octet IP address. This makes address mapping trivial for unicast transmissions: the first two octets of the host number are discarded, leaving the normal four octet IP address. The encapsulation code should use this IP address as the destination address of the UDP/IP tunnel packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于此备忘录的实现，主机号的前两个八位字节将始终为零，最后四个八位字节将是节点的四个八位字节IP地址。这使得单播传输的地址映射变得微不足道：主机号的前两个八位字节被丢弃，剩下正常的四个八位字节的IP地址。封装代码应使用此IP地址作为UDP/IP隧道数据包的目标地址。

contents.text: This mapping will not be able to work with IPv6 addresses.
contents.zh-CHS: 此映射将无法使用IPv6地址。

contents.text: There are also numerous discussions on systems keeping a "peer list" to map between IP and IPX addresses. The specifics are not discussed in the document and are left to the individual implementation.
contents.zh-CHS: 还有许多关于系统保持“对等列表”以在IP和IPX地址之间映射的讨论。具体细节未在本文件中讨论，由个人实施。

contents.text: The section "Maximum Transmission Unit" also has some implications on IP addressing:
contents.zh-CHS: “最大传输单元”一节对IP寻址也有一些影响：

contents.text: Although larger IPX packets are possible, the standard maximum transmission unit for IPX is 576 octets. Consequently, 576 octets is the recommended default maximum transmission unit for IPX packets being sent with this encapsulation technique. With the eight octet UDP header and the 20 octet IP header, the resulting IP packets will be 604 octets long. Note that this is larger than the 576 octet maximum size IP implementations are required to accept. Any IP implementation supporting this encapsulation technique must be capable of receiving 604 octet IP packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 虽然可以使用更大的IPX数据包，但IPX的标准最大传输单元是576个八位字节。因此，对于使用此封装技术发送的IPX数据包，建议使用576个八位字节作为默认最大传输单元。使用8个八位组的UDP报头和20个八位组的IP报头，生成的IP数据包长度将为604个八位组。请注意，这比需要接受的最大大小为576个八位字节的IP实现要大。任何支持这种封装技术的IP实现都必须能够接收604个八位组的IP数据包。

contents.text: As improvements in protocols and hardware allow for larger, unfragmented IP transmission units, the 576 octet maximum IPX packet size may become a liability. For this reason, it is recommended that the IPX maximum transmission unit size be configurable in implementations of this memo.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于协议和硬件的改进允许更大、不分段的IP传输单元，576八位字节的最大IPX数据包大小可能成为一种负担。因此，建议在本备忘录的实施中配置IPX最大传输单元大小。

contents.text: Section 4.5, "TCP/IP (RFC 1006) Network Specific Format" describes a structure that reserves 12 digits for the textual representation of an IP address.
contents.zh-CHS: 第4.5节“TCP/IP（RFC 1006）网络特定格式”描述了一种保留12位数字的结构，用于IP地址的文本表示。

contents.text: This 12 octet field for decimal versions of IP addresses is insufficient for a decimal version of IPv6 addresses. It is possible to define a new encoding using the 20 digit long IP Address + Port + Transport Set fields in order to accommodate a binary version of an IPv6 address, port number and Transport Set. There are several schemes that could be envisioned.
contents.zh-CHS: 十进制版本的IP地址的12个八位字节字段不足以表示十进制版本的IPv6地址。可以使用20位长的IP地址+端口+传输集字段定义新编码，以适应IPv6地址、端口号和传输集的二进制版本。有几个方案是可以设想的。

contents.text: 5.4. RFC 1332 The PPP Internet Protocol Control Protocol (IPCP)
contents.zh-CHS: 5.4. RFC 1332 PPP互联网协议控制协议（IPCP）

contents.text: This specification defines a mechanism for devices to assign IPv4 addresses to PPP clients once PPP negotiation is completed. Section 3, "IPCP Configuration Options", defines IPCP option types which embed the IP address in 4-byte long fields. This is clearly not enough for IPv6.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了一种机制，用于设备在PPP协商完成后将IPv4地址分配给PPP客户端。第3节“IPCP配置选项”定义了将IP地址嵌入4字节长字段的IPCP选项类型。对于IPv6来说，这显然是不够的。

contents.text: However, the specification is clearly designed to allow new Option Types to be added and Should offer no problems for use with IPv6 once appropriate options have been defined.
contents.zh-CHS: 但是，该规范明确设计为允许添加新的选项类型，并且一旦定义了合适的选项，就应该不会给IPv6带来任何问题。

contents.text: For backward compatibility with previous implementations, a null IPv4 protocol address may be received with length = 4 and an allocated address in storage set to the value 0.0.0.0. Receiving stations must be liberal in accepting this format of a null IPv4 address. However, on transmitting an ATMARP or InATMARP packet, a null IPv4 address must only be indicated by the length set to zero and must have no storage allocated.

contents.text: This document states:
contents.zh-CHS: 该文件规定：

contents.text: TIP transaction manager addresses take the form:
contents.zh-CHS: TIP事务管理器地址采用以下形式：

contents.text: <hostport><path>
The <hostport> component comprises:
contents.zh-CHS: <hostport>组件包括：

contents.text: <host>[:<port>]

where <host> is either a <dns name> or an <ip address>; and <port> is a decimal number specifying the port at which the transaction manager (or proxy) is listening for requests to establish TIP connections. If the port number is omitted, the standard TIP port number (3372) is used.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中<host>是<dns name>或<ip地址>；<port>是一个十进制数，指定事务管理器（或代理）侦听建立TIP连接请求的端口。如果省略端口号，则使用标准TIP端口号（3372）。

contents.text: A <dns name> is a standard name, acceptable to the domain name service. It must be sufficiently qualified to be useful to the receiver of the command.
contents.zh-CHS: <dns名称>是域名服务可接受的标准名称。它必须足够合格，以便对命令接收者有用。

contents.text: An <ip address> is an IP address, in the usual form: four decimal numbers separated by period characters.
contents.zh-CHS: <ip地址>是一个ip地址，通常的形式是：四个十进制数字，由句点字符分隔。

contents.text: And further along it states:
contents.zh-CHS: 进一步说：

contents.text: A TIP URL takes the form:
contents.zh-CHS: 提示URL的形式如下：

contents.text: tip://<transaction manager address>?<transaction string>

where <transaction manager address> identifies the TIP transaction manager (as defined in Section 7 above); and <transaction string> specifies a transaction identifier, which may take one of two forms (standard or non-standard):
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，<transaction manager address>标识TIP交易经理（定义见上文第7节）；和<transaction string>指定一个事务标识符，它可以采用两种形式之一（标准或非标准）：

contents.text: i. "urn:" <NID> ":" <NSS>

A standard transaction identifier, conforming to the proposed Internet Standard for Uniform Resource Names (URNs), as specified by RFC2141; where <NID> is the Namespace Identifier, and <NSS> is the Namespace Specific String. The Namespace ID determines the syntactic interpretation of the Namespace Specific String. The Namespace Specific String is a sequence of characters representing a transaction identifier (as defined by <NID>). The rules for the contents of these fields are specified by RFC2141 (valid characters, encoding, etc.).
contents.zh-CHS: 标准事务标识符，符合RFC2141规定的统一资源名称（URN）的拟议互联网标准；其中<NID>是名称空间标识符，<NSS>是特定于名称空间的字符串。命名空间ID确定命名空间特定字符串的语法解释。命名空间特定的字符串是表示事务标识符的字符序列（由<NID>定义）。这些字段内容的规则由RFC2141指定（有效字符、编码等）。

contents.text: This format of <transaction string> may be used to express global transaction identifiers in terms of standard representations. Examples for <NID> might be <iso> or <xopen>, e.g.,
contents.zh-CHS: <transaction string>的这种格式可用于以标准表示形式表示全局事务标识符。<NID>的示例可能是<iso>或<xopen>，例如。，

contents.text: Note that Namespace Ids require registration.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，命名空间ID需要注册。

contents.text: ii. <transaction identifier>
contents.zh-CHS: 二,<事务标识符>

contents.text: A sequence of printable ASCII characters (octets with values in the range 32 through 126 inclusive (excluding ":") representing a transaction identifier. In this non-standard case, it is the combination of <transaction manager address> and <transaction identifier> which ensures global uniqueness, e.g.,
contents.zh-CHS: 表示事务标识符的可打印ASCII字符序列（八位字节，其值范围为32到126（不包括“：”），在这种非标准情况下，是<transaction manager address>和<transaction identifier>的组合，可确保全局唯一性，例如。，

contents.text: The HARP message has several fields that have the following format and values:
contents.zh-CHS: HARP消息有几个字段，其格式和值如下：

contents.text: Data sizes and field meaning: ar$hrd 16 bits Hardware type ar$pro 16 bits Protocol type of the protocol fields below ar$op 16 bits Operation code (request, reply, or NAK) ar$pln 8 bits byte length of each protocol address ar$rhl 8 bits requester's HIPPI hardware address length (q) ar$thl 8 bits target's HIPPI hardware address length (x) ar$rpa 32 bits requester's protocol address ar$tpa 32 bits target's protocol address ar$rha qbytes requester's HIPPI Hardware address ar$tha xbytes target's HIPPI Hardware address
contents.zh-CHS: 数据大小和字段含义：ar$hrd 16位硬件类型ar$pro 16位以下协议字段的协议类型ar$op 16位操作码（请求、应答或NAK）ar$pln每个协议地址的8位字节长度ar$rhl 8位请求者的HIPI硬件地址长度（q）ar$thl 8位目标的HIPI硬件地址长度（x）ar$rpa 32位请求者的协议地址ar$tpa 32位目标的协议地址ar$rha qbytes请求者的HIPI硬件地址ar$tha xbytes目标的HIPI硬件地址

contents.text: Where: ar$hrd - SHALL contain 28. (HIPARP)
contents.zh-CHS: 式中：ar$hrd-应包含28。（HIPARP）

contents.text: ar$pro - SHALL contain the IP protocol code 2048 (decimal).
contents.zh-CHS: ar$pro-应包含IP协议代码2048（十进制）。

contents.text: ar$op - SHALL contain the operational value (decimal): 1 for HARP_REQUESTs 2 for HARP_REPLYs 8 for InHARP_REQUESTs 9 for InHARP_REPLYs 10 for HARP_NAK ar$pln - SHALL contain 4.
contents.zh-CHS: ar$op-应包含操作值（十进制）：1用于HARP_请求2用于HARP_回复8用于InHARP_请求9用于InHARP_回复10用于HARP_NAK ar$pln-应包含4。

contents.text: 6. Experimental RFCs

contents.text: Experimental RFCs typically define protocols that do not have wide scale implementation or usage on the Internet. They are often propriety in nature or used in limited arenas. They are documented to the Internet community in order to allow potential interoperability or some other potential useful scenario. In a few cases they are presented as alternatives to the mainstream solution to an acknowledged problem.
contents.zh-CHS: 实验性RFC通常定义在Internet上没有广泛实施或使用的协议。它们通常在性质上是恰当的，或者在有限的领域中使用。为了允许潜在的互操作性或其他一些潜在的有用场景，它们被记录到互联网社区中。在少数情况下，它们被作为主流解决方案的替代方案来解决一个公认的问题。

contents.text: 4. Packet Formats

contents.text: NARP requests and replies are carried in IP packets as protocol type 54. This section describes the packet formats of NARP requests and replies:

contents.text: And:

contents.text: 6.20. RFC 2009 GPS-Based Addressing and Routing
contents.zh-CHS: 6.20. RFC 2009基于GPS的寻址和路由

contents.text: The document states:
contents.zh-CHS: 该文件指出：

contents.text: The future version of IP (IP v6) will certainly have a sufficient number of bits in its addressing space to provide an address for even smaller GPS addressable units. In this proposal, however, we assume the current version of IP (IP v4) and we make sure that we manage the addressing space more economically than that. We will call the smallest GPS addressable unit a GPS-square.
contents.zh-CHS: IP的未来版本（IPV6）的寻址空间中肯定会有足够数量的位，以便为更小的GPS可寻址单元提供地址。然而，在本提案中，我们假设IP的当前版本（IP v4），并确保我们管理寻址空间的经济性高于此。我们将最小的GPS可寻址单元称为GPS正方形。

contents.text: 7. Summary of the Results
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 结果摘要

contents.text: In the initial survey of RFCs 52 positives were identified out of a total of 186, broken down as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 在对RFC的初步调查中，在总共186个样本中发现了52个阳性样本，细分如下：

contents.text: Standards: 17 out of 24 or 70.83% Draft Standards: 6 out of 20 or 30.00% Proposed Standards: 22 out of 111 or 19.91% Experimental RFCs: 7 out of 31 or 22.58%
contents.zh-CHS: 标准：24项标准中的17项或70.83%标准草案：20项标准中的6项或30.00%拟定标准：111项标准中的22项或19.91%实验性RFC：31项标准中的7项或22.58%

contents.text: Of those identified many require no action because they document outdated and unused protocols, while others are document protocols that are actively being updated by the appropriate working groups. Additionally there are many instances of standards that should be updated but do not cause any operational impact if they are not updated.
contents.zh-CHS: 在已确定的协议中，许多协议不需要采取行动，因为它们记录了过时和未使用的协议，而其他协议则记录了相关工作组正在积极更新的协议。此外，还有许多应更新的标准实例，但如果不更新，则不会造成任何运营影响。

contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.14. 光纤通道上的RFC 2625 IP和ARP

contents.text: There is work in progress to fix these problems
contents.zh-CHS: 目前正在进行修复这些问题的工作

contents.text: 7.3.15. RFC 2672 Non-Terminal DNS Redirection
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.15. RFC 2672非终端DNS重定向

contents.text: No updated document exists for this specification. It is unclear whether one is needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范不存在更新的文档。目前尚不清楚是否需要一个。

contents.text: 7.3.16. RFC 2673 Binary Labels in DNS
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.16. DNS中的RFC 2673二进制标签

contents.text: No updated document exists for this specification. It is unclear whether one is needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范不存在更新的文档。目前尚不清楚是否需要一个。

contents.text: 7.3.17. IP over Vertical Blanking Interval of a TV Signal (RFC 2728)
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.17. 电视信号垂直消隐间隔上的IP（RFC 2728）

contents.text: No updated document exists for this specification. It is unclear whether one is needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范不存在更新的文档。目前尚不清楚是否需要一个。

contents.text: 7.3.18. RFC 2734 IPv4 over IEEE 1394
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.18. 基于IEEE 1394的RFC 2734 IPv4

contents.text: This problem has been fixed by RFC 3146, Transmission of IPv6 Packets Over IEEE 1394 Networks.
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 3146（通过IEEE 1394网络传输IPv6数据包）解决了此问题。

contents.text: 7.3.19. RFC 2834 ARP & IP Broadcasts Over HIPPI 800
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.19. RFC 2834通过HIPPI 800进行ARP和IP广播

contents.text: No updated document exists for this specification. It is unclear whether one is needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范不存在更新的文档。目前尚不清楚是否需要一个。

contents.text: 7.3.20. RFC 2835 ARP & IP Broadcasts Over HIPPI 6400
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.20. RFC 2835通过HIPPI 6400进行ARP和IP广播

contents.text: No updated document exists for this specification. It is unclear whether one is needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范不存在更新的文档。目前尚不清楚是否需要一个。

contents.text: 7.3.21. RFC 3344 Mobility Support for IPv4
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.21. RFC 3344对IPv4的移动支持

contents.text: The problems have been resolved by RFC 3775 and RFC 3776 [3, 4].
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 3775和RFC 3776已经解决了这些问题[3,4]。

contents.text: Since the first Mobile IPv4 specification in RFC 2002, a number of extensions to it have been specified. As all of these depend on MIPv4, they have been omitted from further analysis in this memo.
contents.zh-CHS: 自2002年RFC推出第一个移动IPv4规范以来，已经指定了许多扩展。由于所有这些都依赖于MIPv4，因此在本备忘录的进一步分析中省略了它们。

contents.text: 7.3.22. RFC 3376 Internet Group Management Protocol, Version 3
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.22. RFC 3376 Internet组管理协议，版本3

contents.text: This problem is being fixed by MLDv2 specification [5].
contents.zh-CHS: MLDv2规范[5]正在修复此问题。

contents.text: 7.4. Experimental RFCs
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4. 实验RFC

contents.text: 7.4.1. RFC 1307 Dynamically Switched Link Control Protocol
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.1. RFC1307动态交换链路控制协议

contents.text: No updated document exists for this specification. It is unclear whether one is needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范不存在更新的文档。目前尚不清楚是否需要一个。

contents.text: 7.4.2. RFC 1393 Traceroute using an IP Option
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.2. 使用IP选项的RFC 1393跟踪路由

contents.text: This specification relies on the use of an IPv4 option. No replacement document exists, and it is unclear whether one is needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范依赖于IPv4选项的使用。没有替代文件，也不清楚是否需要。

contents.text: 7.4.3. RFC 1735 NBMA Address Resolution Protocol (NARP)
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.3. RFC 1735 NBMA地址解析协议（NARP）

contents.text: This functionality has been defined in RFC 2491, IPv6 over Non-Broadcast Multiple Access (NBMA) networks and RFC 2332, NBMA Next Hop Resolution Protocol (NHRP).
contents.zh-CHS: 该功能已在RFC 2491、非广播多址（NBMA）网络上的IPv6和RFC 2332、NBMA下一跳解析协议（NHRP）中定义。

contents.text: 7.4.4. RFC 1788 ICMP Domain Name Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.4. RFC 1788 ICMP域名消息

contents.text: No updated document exists for this specification. However, DNS Dynamic Updates should provide similar functionality, so an update does not seem necessary.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范不存在更新的文档。但是，DNS动态更新应该提供类似的功能，因此更新似乎没有必要。

contents.text: 7.4.5. RFC 1868 ARP Extension - UNARP
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.5. RFC 1868 ARP扩展-UNARP

contents.text: This mechanism defined a mechanism to purge ARP caches on a link. That functionality already exists in RFC 2461, Neighbor Discovery for IPv6.
contents.zh-CHS: 此机制定义了清除链接上ARP缓存的机制。该功能已经存在于RFC 2461中，即IPv6的邻居发现。

contents.text: 7.4.6. RFC 2143 IP Over SCSI
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.6. rfc2143ipoverscsi

contents.text: No updated document exists for this specification. It is unclear whether one is needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范不存在更新的文档。目前尚不清楚是否需要一个。

contents.text: 7.4.7. RFC 3180 GLOP Addressing in 233/8
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.7. RFC 3180 233/8中的GLOP寻址

contents.text: Similar functionality is provided by RFC 3306, Unicast-Prefix-based IPv6 Multicast Addresses, and no action is necessary.
contents.zh-CHS: RFC3306（基于单播前缀的IPv6多播地址）提供了类似的功能，无需执行任何操作。

contents.text: 8. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 安全考虑

contents.text: This memo examines the IPv6-readiness of specifications; this does not have security considerations in itself.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录审查了规范的IPv6准备情况；这本身没有安全考虑。
